Html:
Why are boots of the grieving soul (ilvl 232) showing as 281.95 dps, and my new boots, boots of the mourning widow (ilvl 245) showing as 40.13 dps?  This is total with pet.

Also noticed other boots that are way off.

Footpads of the icy flow 12.48 dps

spellslingers slipper's 8.94 dps

Is this something to do with the haste thing your working on?
Please search for existing issues and post there before creating new ones for the exact same thing.

I would love to, where would i go about doing that?  I searched "warlock boots" in the "search all codeplex projects" field at the top right of the page and nothing came up, is there another search function that I'm not aware of?
